hotels.vendor_name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Shoal Bay
hotels.title: Beachside Shoal Bay Apartment-Style Resort along NSW's North Coast with Lagoon Pool & Dining Credit
hotels.description: Follow the sun-kissed Central Coast to Shoal Bay, and enjoy a relaxing beachside paradise perched on the glorious shores in Port Stephens, an hour from Newcastle. Home to a sun-lit lagoon pool with a kids' wading area and indoor lap pool, this palm-fringed resort is ideal for groups and families. Work up a sweat at the fitness centre, dine at one of the onsite eateries and unwind at Sir√®ne Spa - this tranquil retreat has something for everyone. Explore the surrounding coastal trails on foot or take two wheels and feel the sea breeze from a bicycle. Plunge into rolling waves on a stand-up paddleboard and test your water sports skills in the comfort of a kayak. Explore nearby Port Stephens, which has everything from wildlife to wineries, or drive south to Newcastle, where top restaurants, boutiques, galleries and more gorgeous beaches await.
